item.title: The First Time I Learning Programming
item.description: It’s almost six years since the first time I learn programming. But I never think of making my own site/blog. Finally, I got to make it happen in 2021 ü•≥. So, in my first post, I will tell my little story when the first time I learn programming üë®‚Äçüíª. I started learning programming back in 2015 at STIKOM Uyelindo Kupang College. Before Goto College It all started when I didn’t finish my education in senior high school.
